text: today in this kids can cook clean video
I'll be showing you how to teach a
younger child to crack an egg and avoid
getting all those little bits of
eggshell in the eggs Minnie chef and I
are making Saturday morning pancakes you
can see the bowl of flour in the
background here it's time to add the
eggs to the flour so I gave him a
separate Bowl to crack his eggs into now
the trick is to have them do one egg at
a time like he's doing here he will
crack one egg and then check it for
Shell pieces before he empties the egg
into the bowl of flour and just like
that they learn quickly and easily and
gain a ton of confidence in the kitchen
if you've enjoyed this kids can cook
clean episode from the gracious Pantry
please like my video And subscribe to my
channel and as always feel free to ask
any questions in the comment below
thanks for
watching
